SEARCH
Package dev.restate.sdk.core

Interface EndpointRequestHandler.LoggingContextSetter

Enclosing class:
EndpointRequestHandler
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface public static interface EndpointRequestHandler.LoggingContextSetter
Interface to abstract setting the logging context variables.

In classic multithreaded environments, you can just use THREAD_LOCAL_INSTANCE, though the caller of EndpointRequestHandler must take care of the cleanup of the thread local map.
